channel.title: 1 cent host gator hosting!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z190/Alecg39/1163593280420.gif[/img][b]1cent hosting tut[/b][img]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z190/Alecg39/1163593280420.gif[/img]
tbh this is not realy a tut but it could help u
green = important blue = very important
Step one go [url=https://secure.hostgator.com/billing/order/orderwiz.php?v=1&type3_package=3&submit_package=package&submit=]here[/url] and choose "I will use My Existing Domain and update My Nameservers only." then put your domain name in there (if you dont have a domain name you can regester one [url=http://duoservers.com/?r=pwnhosting]here[/url] (look at top left to regester one), now once you have you domain and entered it into the box on host gator click continue, now scroll down a but where it says billing cycle make sure it is on "Monthly @ $9.95". Now a bit more down enter this into the coupon part "hgc25" and now click Calculate Totals and then just fill in your personal infomation and wula you done.
